ArchTScience

To question and rethink standardized design steps, going against the tide, rather than swimming along with it - these are the mottos that have led us to create ArchTScience. Approaching the architectural design from the scientific point of view at the intersection of psychology and information technologies is the fundamental principle of our company. We pay tribute to innovative thinking and always consider the individual characteristics of humans when developing projects.

Architecture, IT&  Science

The philosophy of ArchTScience reflects the influence of architecture on the human subconscious, which allows us to create not just aesthetically attractive designs, but spaces that meet individual needs and the most daring desires of our customers.

ArchTScience was founded by three partners in 2021: the founder and the head of the scientific department Anastasia Svetlova (Brazil), the founder and the head of the architectural department Polina Olins (China), and the head of the IT department Azat Vakhitov (Austria). Our production team gathers dozens of employees from around the world. For that reason, ArchTScience rightfully calls itself a global architecture company.

Architecture has never been so thoughtful! When developing projects, we use a carefully selected and systematized set of scientific data obtained through the innovative development of our IT department in the artificial intelligence area. The scientific department pays close attention to the latest research on architecture, psychology, and medicine, which allows us to approach the needs of customers in a comprehensive manner. ArchTScience. individually. That's why ideally.
